dynamic_line: To be honest...  I don't really remember.  I remember vague details of my life before the world was like this, but <the_cataclysm> itself?  It's all a blur.  I don't know how I got where I am now, or how any of this happened.  I think something pretty bad must have happened to me.  Or maybe I was just hit in the head really hard.  Or both.  Both seems likely.
